DOC.brief_summary: Through several questionaries the investigators will measure the satisfaction of patients diagnosed with anaphylaxis in the use of a medical device for the adrenaline autoinjector, a smart case for an epinephrine autoinjector connected via Bluetooth to a mobile application.
DOC.brief_title: Satisfaction of Patient With Anaphylaxis in the Use of a Medical Device
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 years old or above Patients diagnosed with Anaphylaxis and an epinephrine autoinjector prescribed Patients with a smartphone Patients who signed the informed consent Patients who have not signed the informed consent Patients with some limitations for understanding or following correctly the trial procedures Pregnant or nursing women
